text: Whiteford is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Andy Whiteford (born 1977), Scottish footballer and manager *Blackie Whiteford (1889–1962), American actor *Derek Whiteford (born 1947), Scottish footballer and manager *Doug Whiteford (died 1979), Australian racing driver *Eilidh Whiteford (born 1969), Scottish politician *Kate Whiteford (born 1952), Scottish artist *Peter Whiteford (born 1980), Scottish golfer *Robert Whiteford, Scottish mixed martial artist Category:English-language surnames
title: Whiteford (surname)
